title: User is able to access the order confirmation screen from submission of an order
custom_preconds:
GIVEN, a user has items added to the cart
AND the user is ready to place the order.
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the "place order" button
custom_expected: THEN, the order confirmation screen is displayed.

title: User is able to access the order confirmation screen from home view
custom_preconds: GIVEN, the user has previously placed an dorder
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the last placed order from the home screen
custom_expected: THEN, the order confirmation screen is displayed

title: User can scroll order confirmation screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN, a user has access the order confirmation screen(s), from either submission of an order or from the home view
custom_steps: WHEN the order confirmation screen is displayed
custom_expected: THEN, a user is able to scroll the order confirmation screen to view all the items ordered.

title: Order confirmation screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN, the user has access the order confirmation screen(s), from either submission of an order or from the home view
custom_steps: WHEN the order confirmation screen is displayed
custom_expected:
THEN, the order confirmation screen has the following:
-"X" close button
-Header "Order Confirmation"
-Refresh button
-Order #
-Barcode
-Text below the barcode which reads "Present this barcode at the counter to pick up your order."
-Pickup location
-Order details
-Order summary

title: 2d barcode is present on the order confirmation screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN, a user has access the order confirmation screen(s), from either submission of an order or from the home view
custom_steps: WHEN the order confirmation screen is displayed
custom_expected: THEN, 2d barcode made available to the user upon submitting order, so that the user can present it and have it scanned at the POS to pick up the order.

title: User is able to close the order confirmation screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN, a user has access the order confirmation screen(s), from either submission of an order or from the home view
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps "X" close button on the top left corner
custom_expected:
THEN, the order confirmation screen is dismissed
AND the user is returned back to the home view screen.

title: Order confirmation screen refreshes as user enter from any access point
custom_preconds: GIVEN, a user has access the order confirmation screen(s), from either submission of an order or from the home view
custom_steps: WHEN the order confirmation screen is displayed
custom_expected: THEN, the order confirmation screen is automatically refreshed

title: User is manually able to refresh the order confirmation screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN, a user has access the order confirmation screen(s), from either submission of an order or from the home view
custom_steps:
WHEN the order confirmation screen is displayed
AND the user taps on the refresh button on top right
custom_expected: THEN, the order confirmation screen is refreshed.

title: **(Deprecated) User is able to cancel order**
custom_preconds: GIVEN, a user has access the order confirmation screen(s), from either submission of an order or from the home view
custom_steps:
WHEN the order confirmation screen is displayed
AND the user taps "Cancel Order"
custom_expected:
THEN, a double button dialog is displayed to confirm that user wants to cancel their order
AND the user has the options to either cancel the request or tap "OK" to continue with canceling the order
-Tapping "Cancel" voids the order cancellation and user is returned to the order confirmation screen
-Tapping "OK" confirms order cancellation and displays another single button dialog
Text reads "Your order is now canceled." and user can tap "OK" to dismiss and returned to home view

title: Order number is populated on the order confirmation screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN, a user has access the order confirmation screen(s), from either submission of an order or from the home view
custom_steps: WHEN the order confirmation screen is displayed
custom_expected: THEN, "friendly_ID" attribute populate the order # on the order confirmation screen.

title: Device brightness adjust accordingly on the order confirmation screen so, the scanner can easily pick up the bar code
custom_preconds: GIVEN, a user has access the order confirmation screen(s), from either submission of an order or from the home view
custom_steps:
WHEN the order confirmation page is displayed
AND the barcode is present on the screen
custom_expected: THEN the device brightness automatically turns up to maximum for the easy picking of the barcode from a scanner.
